channel.title: LI on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in LI on FinanClub

item.title: 1108 LI
item.description: score:1108 Chances: Li Auto deliveries surpassed 30,000 for the second straight month, with Li keeping the top spot among startups. Chinese electric-vehicle makers Li Auto, XPeng, and NIO deliver a combined 65,604 vehicles in July, a record and up more than 100% from last year.
